channel.title: openssl on Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in openssl on Hugo

item.title: How to create ssl cert for tls auth
item.description: Procedures create private key create csr (distinguished_name) sign csr by CA (x509v3) Commands Gen private key openssl genrsa \ -out ca.key Self signed crt openssl req -x509 \ -config openssl.cnf -new \ -out ca.crt \ -key ca.key gen csr openssl req \ -config openssl.cnf -new \ -out server.csr \ -key server.key sign crt openssl x509 \ -extfile openssl.cnf \ -extensions svr_cert \ -in server.csr \ -out server.crt \ -CA ca.
